param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Maximum Rudder Angle
param.desc: Scale factor to be multiplied to the rudder actuation reference [-45, 45] degrees.

param.name: Enable Thruster Controller
param.desc: Enable Thruster Controller [True = Controller, False = User defined]

param.name: Enable Heading Controller
param.desc: Enable Heading Controller [True = Controller, False = User defined]

param.name: User Defined Rudder Angle
param.desc: User defines the rudder angle which is to be applied / sent over serial. Condition: Enable Heading Controller = False.

param.name: User Defined Thruster Actuation
param.desc: User defines the applied thruster actuation / sent over serial. Condition: Enable Thruster Controller = False.

param.name: Enable Thrust During Turn
param.desc: Assist the turn using the thruster

param.name: Minimum Speed for Thrust
param.desc: Speed [m/s] below which thruster is used

param.name: Yaw PID Gains Transect
param.desc: PID gains for YAW controller during straight line

param.name: Yaw PID Gains Turning
param.desc: PID gains for YAW controller during turn

param.name: Ramp Actuation Limit
param.desc: Ramp actuation limit when the value is rising in actuation per second

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Activate LP Filtering
param.desc: Activate Low-pass filtering of computed rudder angle

param.name: Activate N Filtering
param.desc: Activate Notch filtering of computed rudder angle

param.name: Activate BS Filtering
param.desc: Activate Band-stop filtering of computed rudder angle

param.name: Activate External Filtering
param.desc: Activate external user-defined filtering of computed rudder angle

param.name: LPF scaling
param.desc: Low-pass filter gain to remove HF components

param.name: BSF scaling
param.desc: BSF scaling percentage around cut-off estimated frequency

param.name: Desired Course Percentage Increase
param.desc: Incremental portioning during desired course change.

param.name: Desired Course Difference Threshold
param.desc: Incremental portioning during desired course change.

param.name: Desired turning rate
param.desc: User-defined desired turning rate in rad/s.

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Control Frequency
param.desc: Control frequency (< 0 for event-driven EstimatedState processing)

param.name: Along-track -- Minimum Yaw
param.desc: Minimum yaw speed for track bearing convergence

param.name: Cross-track -- Distance Limit
param.desc: Distance threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Cross-track -- Time Limit
param.desc: Time threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Position Jump Threshold
param.desc: Threshold for a jump in EstimatedState to turn monitors off

param.name: Position Jump Time Factor
param.desc: Relation between monitor disabling time and position jump

param.name: New Reference Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for new incoming path reference

param.name: Bottom Track -- Enabled
param.desc: Enable or disable bottom track control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Forward Samples
param.desc: Number of samples for forward range moving average

param.name: Bottom Track -- Safe Pitch
param.desc: Safe pitch angle to perform bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Slope Hysteresis
param.desc: Slope hysteresis when recovering from avoidance

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Range
param.desc: Minimum admissible forward range for bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Check Trend
param.desc: Check slope angle trend in unsafe state

param.name: Bottom Track -- Depth Avoidance
param.desc: Enable or disable obstacle avoidance during depth control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Admissible Altitude
param.desc: Admissible altitude when doing depth control

param.name: Minimum Waypoint Dist Switch
param.desc: Distance from waypoint when switch to next waypoint happens.

param.name: Maximum Obstacle Surveillance Range
param.desc: Limit for absolute value of obstacle surveillance range

param.name: Remove Disappeared Obstacles
param.desc: Amount of time after which a disappeared obstacle is removed from the list. [sec].

param.name: Prediction Horizon Geog Constraints
param.desc: Simulation time (prediction horizon) for static obstacles [sec].

param.name: Weight on Time to Evaluation Instant
param.name-i18n: Weight on Time to Evaluation Instant
param.desc: Weight on Time to Evaluation Instant.

param.name: Weight on Distance at Evaluation Instant
param.name-i18n: Weight on Distance at Evaluation Instant
param.desc: Weight on Distance at Evaluation Instant.

param.name: Minimal Safe Distance
param.desc: Minimal distance which is considered as safe [m].

param.name: Cost of not complying COLREGS
param.desc: Cost of not Complying with the COLREGS.

param.name: Cost of changing COLREGS
param.desc: Cost of changing a COLREGS behavior.

param.name: PHI AH
param.desc: Angle within which an obstacle is said to be ahead [deg].

param.name: PHI OT
param.desc: Angle outside of which an obstacle will be said to be overtaking, if the speed of the obstacle is larger than the ship's own speed [deg].

param.name: PHI HO
param.desc: Angle within which an obstacle is said to be head on [deg].

param.name: PHI CR
param.desc: Angle outside of which an obstacle is said to be crossing, if it is on the starboard side, heading towards the ship and not overtaking the ship [deg].

param.name: Cost of Deviating from Nominal Speed
param.name-i18n: Cost of Deviating from Nominal Speed
param.desc: Cost of deviating from the nominal speed.

param.name: Cost of Changing Speed Offset
param.desc: Cost of Changing the Speed Offset

param.name: Cost of Deviating from Nominal Course
param.name-i18n: Cost of Deviating from Nominal Course
param.desc: Cost of deviating from the nominal Course.

param.name: Cost of Course change to SB
param.name-i18n: Cost of Course change to SB
param.desc: Cost of Changing the Course Offset to Starboard.

param.name: Cost of Course change to Port
param.name-i18n: Cost of Course change to Port
param.desc: Cost of Changing the Course Offset to Port.

param.name: Cost of Selecting Turn to SB
param.name-i18n: Cost of Selecting Turn to SB
param.desc: Cost of Selecting Turn to SB.

param.name: Cost of Selecting Turn to Port
param.name-i18n: Cost of Selecting Turn to Port
param.desc: Cost of Selecting Turn to Port.

param.name: Positive Granularity
param.desc: Portions of positive angle range in degrees

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of loitering circle after arriving at destination

param.name: Z Value
param.desc: Z value to maintain while executing this maneuver.

param.name: Z Mode
param.desc: Z Mode to use. One of Depth, Altitude or Height.

param.name: Loiter -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for Loiter to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: StationKeeping -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for StationKeeping to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: YoYo -- Maximum Pitch Variation
param.desc: Maximum pitch variation step when changing z direction

param.name: YoYo -- Check Path Errors
param.desc: True if we should check path errors and stabilize pitch

param.name: Elevator -- Radius Tolerance
param.desc: Distance tolerance to start loitering near elevator's location

param.name: Elevator -- VMonitor -- Minimum Speed
param.desc: Negative values will disable vertical progress monitor

param.name: Elevator -- VMonitor -- Timeout
param.desc: Timeout when progress is below the specified value

param.name: Elevator -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: PopUp -- Minimum Satellites
param.desc: Least number of satellites to accept fixes

param.name: PopUp -- Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance between gps_fix position and the estimated state

param.name: PopUp -- Maximum Distance From Station
param.desc: Maximum distance from station keeping radial circle

param.name: PopUp -- Report at PopUps
param.desc: Request reports when popping at surface

param.name: Dislodge -- Bursts
param.desc: Number of bursts with the motor

param.name: Dislodge -- Minimum Distance
param.desc: Minimum distance to ground or object to stop burst

param.name: Dislodge -- Safe Depth Gap
param.desc: Safe depth change to consider the maneuver was successful

param.name: Dislodge -- Safe Depth Gap
param.desc: Safe depth change to consider the maneuver was successful

param.name: ScheduledGoto -- Minimum Speed
param.desc: Move only at speeds higher than the minimum speed

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 0 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 0 servo

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 1 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 1 servo

param.name: Sample -- Syringe 2 Id
param.desc: Port to use for syringe 2 servo

param.name: Sample -- Execution Tolerance
param.desc: Default time tolerance to execute maneuver

param.name: StationKeepingExtended -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for StationKeepingExtended to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring
param.default: Daemon, GPS, Navigation, Operational Limits, Path Control

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Initial Setting - Maximum Vertical Rate
param.desc: Initial setting for maximum vertical rate

param.name: Minimum Depth to Check Altitude
param.desc: Minimum depth required to check altitude operational limits

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Position Error Threshold
param.desc: Threshold for position error in fault detection

param.name: Position Rate Factor
param.desc: Factor in fault detection for comparison between accumulated differences

param.name: Position Error Delay
param.desc: Delay for the detection triggering using DelayedTrigger class

param.name: Position Error Samples
param.desc: Number of samples for the moving average in the DelayedTrigger object

param.name: Maximum Rotation Rate
param.desc: Maximum rotation rate allowed by the servo

param.name: Current Fault Detection
param.desc: Enable servo electric current fault detection

param.name: Current Lower Threshold
param.desc: Current lower threshold to consider abnormal behavior

param.name: Current Upper Threshold
param.desc: Current upper threshold to consider abnormal behavior

param.name: Maximum Lower Faults
param.desc: Number of faults above the lower threshold to consider a current fault detection

param.name: Maximum Upper Faults
param.desc: Number of faults above the upper threshold to consider a current fault detection

param.name: Fault Time Cooldown
param.desc: Period of time after which the fault vectors will be reset to zero

param.name: Failure Error Timeout
param.desc: Period of time to count number of errors that issue a failure

param.name: Failure Error Count
param.desc: Maximum number of errors allowed in a period of time that issue a failure

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Active
param.desc: Determines if output has to be used

param.name: Convert Height to Geoid Height
param.desc: Convert WGS84 height to geoid height (mean sea level) height

param.name: Compute Progress
param.desc: True if plan progress should be computed

param.name: Fuel Prediction
param.desc: True if plan's fuel prediction should be computed

param.name: Perform Calibration
param.desc: True if calibration should be performed at all

param.name: Abort On Failed Activation
param.desc: Abort when a payload fails to activate

param.name: StationKeeping Speed in RPM
param.desc: Speed in RPM for the station keeping

param.name: IMU Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the IMU for fuel prediction

param.desc: Entity label of the Plan Generator

param.desc: Depth to dive in response to 'dive' command

param.desc: Depth to use when traveling (Goto maneuvers)

param.name: Dive seconds
param.desc: Time to be under water in response to 'dive' command (seconds)

param.name: Loiter radius
param.desc: Radius of generated loiter and station keeping maneuvers

param.name: RPM Speed
param.desc: Speed in RPMs to be used in the generated maneuvers

param.desc: Set of commands for plans to generate at boot

param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.desc: Age, in seconds, after which received IMC messages are discarded.

param.desc: Text messages received via Iridium will be tagged with this origin

param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the modem

param.name: Mailbox Check - Periodicity
param.desc: Amount of time without alert rings or MT SBDs before doing a mailbox check

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of second to wait before forcing data to be written to disk
